Color

The color palette is a foundation pillar of Retool. It gives the product an immediate sense of being familiar and warm. The color palette leverages Retoolâ€™s utilitarian heritage, and builds towards providing users with a polished and intelligent interface.

Retool is committed to complying with APCA contrast ratios (WCAG thread) for all text within the UI.

Primary palette

Our primary palette consists of grays, white, and blue. These colors are represented in the UI chrome while reserving the secondary palette when pops of energy and color are necessary. The customization palette is reserved for customers when applying an accent color to an app avatar or mobile app.

Name
Gray 900
HSL
0, 0, 5
HEX
#0d0d0d

HSL

Secondary palette

Our secondary palette is made up of red, green, yellow, and purple. These should be used sparringly in the UI per the below usage guidelines.
